text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha tae aoy yeung buongsuong som phe sa ng pi a l laoh nouv avei del min phdal phalobrayoch dl puok yeung ning min phdal krohthnak dl puok yeung haey puok yeung nung vilotralb tow kraoy vinh( pheap kmean chomnue) banteabpi a l laoh ban changaoul bangheanh dl puok yeung dauch chn del shai t n ban ausateanh ke aoy v nge vng now leu phendei khn del roubke mean mi td ph ke d kampoung ampeavneav ke tow rk meakra del meankar changaoulobangheanh( daoy niyeay tha) chaur anak mk kan puok yeung mk noh ryy? chaur anak pol tha pitabrakd nasa kar changaoulobangheanh robsa a l laoh vea chea kar changaoulobangheanh da troemotrauv . haey puok yeung trauv ban ke brae daembi braklkhluon tow champoh mcheasa krobkrong piphp teangoasa
